original_text:
That is where the tribes go up—
    the tribes of the Lord—
to praise the name of the Lord
    according to the statute given to Israel.
korean_text: 지파들 곧 여호와의 지파들이 여호와의 이름에 감사하려고 이스라엘의 전례대로 그리로 올라가는도다

sentences.original_text: That is where the tribes go up
to praise the name of the Lord
according to the statute given to Israel
